item.title: Allow scroll through top iTerm mac
item.description: If you print or log bunch of data in Terminal (Iterm) normally, you can’t scroll back to your latest command. Here is how to do it Go to iTerm > Preferences > Profile Tab > Teriminal Check the “Unlimited scrollback” option Now, you can get to the top of your terminal with this
